top_strengths.listing_advice: Highlight the auto-boost capability up to 5.1GHz with minimal BIOS tweaks (PBO and DOCP)
top_strengths.example_quote: This chip boosts to 5.1ghz when using 2-3 cores or less easily and even if under full load will still stay around 4.75ghz on all 8 cores at 100% load.

top_strengths.listing_advice: Emphasize easy upgrade path for existing AM4 users (e.g., 'Drop-in replacement for Ryzen 3000/2000 series with BIOS update')
top_strengths.example_quote: AMDs support of the AM4 platform for so long has really allowed people to stretch out the lifespan of their older systems.

top_strengths.listing_advice: Add a cooling recommendation bullet (e.g., 'Stays below 75°C under load when paired with quality air coolers like Noctua NH-D15')
top_strengths.example_quote: With a Noctua NH-U12S Redux, temperatures remain around 35-40°C idle and 70-75°C under stress.

buyer_personas.description: Values high FPS gains (especially at 1080P/1440P), DLSS compatibility, and future-proofing for GPU upgrades
Seeks cost-effective performance boost without changing motherboard (coming from Ryzen 2000/3000 series)
Needs 8 cores/16 threads for streaming, editing, and multitasking while maintaining gaming performance

Add bold warning in listing: 'Requires aftermarket cooler - we recommend Thermalright Peerless Assassin or liquid cooling'
Improve shipping materials to prevent damage (mention this improvement in listing)
